This goes to all the anti-gunners who say "Call 9-11".
 
 Fla. man gets life sentence in informant murder - Florida AP - MiamiHerald.com
 
 I am glad to see that this guy will never again see life outside bars. But Ms. Hoffman is still dead. The police weren't there to protect her, nor was the law or due process.
 
 Every murder that happens shows why calling 9-11 isn't effective. Even if you do call them before you're attacked, the time it takes the police to arrive is plenty of time for your attacker to rob and kill you.
